chemicals_used.name: Dry CO2
chemicals_used.details: bubbled through the solution for 2 hours

synthesis_conditions.time: Stirred at -78 °C for 1 hour, then at room temperature for 20 hours
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Extracted with ethyl acetate, washed with NaS2O3, H2O, and brine
synthesis_conditions.purification_method: Column chromatography, eluted with 5% acetic acid and 95% ethyl acetate

synthesis_conditions.additional_details: The structure of UBMOF-1 was determined by single crystal XRD, isomorphous with IRMOF-10 and IRMOF-14.
